item.title: My Experience With Rebuilding a Product from Ground Up
item.description: I joined my present company (Pettysave) mid-2019 after concluding my undergraduate studies. In my first few weeks, I didn’t feel like I was in a tech company. The business product was initially built by an outsourcing agency. In my opinion, they didn’t do a good job with the product. Of course, I wasn’t present during the process of developing the product so I did not know how they got there. One thing was sure, the product was very problematic and needed an upgrade.
